name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live ＂LOCK ON＂ 有明アリーナ [DpYSUe6Ca9o]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Knock it out!!'.
Transition between songs. Kanata introduces the next theme.
MC section after the song. Kanata interacts with the audience and takes a water break.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 安泰 結局ね
subtitles.english: It's okay, peace of mind, after all,

subtitles.original: 真っ白な世界に今を
subtitles.english: in a pure white world, I'll show you

subtitles.original: 見せないから ずっと今日も一緒
subtitles.english: nothing, so we'll be together today too.

subtitles.original: A-La-La-La 噛み付いてたんだ 気持ちになる
subtitles.english: A-La-La-La, I was biting into that feeling.

subtitles.original: 本能的な線になれるまで 愛してあげるね
subtitles.english: Until I become an instinctive line, I'll love you.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫 どんどん欲張ってみかして 秘密に恋子焦がして
subtitles.english: It's okay, show me more of your greed, longing for secrets.

subtitles.original: 泣いちゃうくらい 笑っちゃうくらい ちゃんと愛 愛 愛
subtitles.english: Enough to cry, enough to laugh, proper love, love, love.

subtitles.original: Love you!
subtitles.english: Love you!

subtitles.original: 自分、陰キャですから。
subtitles.english: Because I'm a gloomy character.

subtitles.original: あぁ 怖い 人間が怖い！
subtitles.english: Ah, scary! People are scary!

subtitles.original: 許して 見ないで！
subtitles.english: Forgive me! Don't look at me!

subtitles.original: でもちょっとは見て
subtitles.english: But look at me a little bit.

subtitles.original: ボロボロ ボロボロ ボロボロ 哀しきインキャラだバイバイ
subtitles.english: Tattered, tattered, tattered. It's a sad gloomy character, bye-bye.

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: 今日も 今日も ネガティブコア
subtitles.english: Today, today too, negative core.

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: 世界で一番 反対で
subtitles.english: The most 'opposite' in the world.

subtitles.original: 袖が当たれば漏れる泣き声
subtitles.english: If our sleeves touch, a sob escapes.

subtitles.original: 及ぶねの彼方 憂鬱マヂ
subtitles.english: Beyond my reach, seriously melancholy.

subtitles.original: 終わらない会議始まる
subtitles.english: An endless meeting begins.

subtitles.original: うるせー！
subtitles.english: Shut up!

subtitles.original: 知らねー！
subtitles.english: I don't know!

subtitles.original: 嫌ねー！
subtitles.english: I hate it!

subtitles.original: デトックス求めて東奔
subtitles.english: Running east and west seeking a detox.

subtitles.original: 西走！
subtitles.english: Running west!

subtitles.original: 炎上！
subtitles.english: Flaming!

subtitles.original: 挙動不審でごめんなさい
subtitles.english: Sorry for my suspicious behavior.

subtitles.original: ただ嫌われたくないだけなもんで
subtitles.english: It's just that I don't want to be hated.

subtitles.original: 震える両手足りぬ冷や汗 飛ばっ 飛ばっ 飛ばっ
subtitles.english: Trembling hands, not enough cold sweat. Fly! Fly! Fly!

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう 手抜き笑おう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, a lazy laugh.

subtitles.original: あはは、いふふ、なるほどですね！
subtitles.english: Ahaha, ifufu, I see!

subtitles.original: 全然全然お構いなく
subtitles.english: Not at all, not at all, don't mind me.

subtitles.original: 反省 反省 また反省だ
subtitles.english: Reflection, reflection, reflection again.

subtitles.original: 胸の中を ワンツー 強く打つのに
subtitles.english: Even though my chest beats strongly, one, two.

subtitles.original: 明日は今日より人間になりたい
subtitles.english: Tomorrow I want to be more human than today.

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: 真っ暗お部屋で反省会
subtitles.english: A reflection meeting in a pitch-black room.

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: たどたどおもてで後悔中
subtitles.english: Regretting with halting words on the outside.

subtitles.original: 空気を読むこと数千年
subtitles.english: Reading the air for thousands of years.

subtitles.original: 声の聞こえに耳を澄まし
subtitles.english: Straining my ears to hear the voices.

subtitles.original: 群れず 呼ばれず 関わらず
subtitles.english: Not flocking, not called, not involved.

subtitles.original: そう 誰が呼んだか 陰の者
subtitles.english: Yes, someone called me 'the gloomy one'.

subtitles.original: 陰キャと呼ばれるこの生物は 心の中が非常に...
subtitles.english: This creature called a gloomy character has a mind that is extremely...

subtitles.original: 0.5秒の間に何十何百といった...
subtitles.english: ...tens or hundreds of things in the span of 0.5 seconds...

subtitles.original: 妄想と心配事を同時に展開し...
subtitles.english: ...developing delusions and worries simultaneously...

subtitles.original: そして自分にショート、フリーズ、タイマーするのである！
subtitles.english: ...and then they short-circuit, freeze, and time out on themselves!

subtitles.original: 急な無茶振り やだやだやだやだ
subtitles.english: Sudden unreasonable demands, no no no no.

subtitles.original: 雑談トークの特等席 やだやだやだやだ
subtitles.english: A front-row seat for small talk, no no no no.

subtitles.original: 誰かが待ってるエレベーター
subtitles.english: The elevator where someone is waiting.

subtitles.original: そう 我らこそ 陰の者
subtitles.english: Yes, we are the gloomy ones.

subtitles.original: 陰キャに愛を！
subtitles.english: Give love to the gloomy characters!

subtitles.original: 陰キャに愛を！
subtitles.english: Give love to the gloomy characters!

subtitles.original: 陰キャに愛を！
subtitles.english: Give love to the gloomy characters!

subtitles.original: 哀しきインキャラだバイバイ
subtitles.english: It's a sad gloomy character, bye-bye.

subtitles.original: 目を合わせずにごめんなさい
subtitles.english: Sorry for not making eye contact.

subtitles.original: その明るい瞳が眩しくて
subtitles.english: Because those bright eyes are too dazzling.

subtitles.original: 間が持たなくてごめんなさい
subtitles.english: Sorry for not being able to keep the conversation going.

subtitles.original: この会話も全てが演説で
subtitles.english: Even this conversation is all just a speech.

subtitles.original: 挙動不審でごめんなさい
subtitles.english: Sorry for my suspicious behavior.

subtitles.original: ただ嫌われたくないだけなもんで
subtitles.english: It's just that I don't want to be hated.

subtitles.original: 張り付く笑顔足りぬ冷や汗 飛ばっ 飛ばっ 飛ばっ
subtitles.english: A plastered smile, not enough cold sweat. Fly! Fly! Fly!

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう 手抜き笑おう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, a lazy laugh.

subtitles.original: あはは、いふふ、なるほどですね！
subtitles.english: Ahaha, ifufu, I see!

subtitles.original: 怖いくらいからきまくり
subtitles.english: Coming from a place of being scary.

subtitles.original: 反省 反省 また反省だ
subtitles.english: Reflection, reflection, reflection again.

subtitles.original: 鏡ですらも目をそらした
subtitles.english: I even averted my eyes from the mirror.

subtitles.original: 明日は今日より人間になりたい
subtitles.english: Tomorrow I want to be more human than today.

subtitles.original: 愛を！ 愛を！
subtitles.english: Love! Love!

subtitles.original: インキャに愛を！
subtitles.english: Give love to the gloomy characters!

subtitles.original: 今日も 今日も ネガティブコア
subtitles.english: Today, today too, negative core.

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: どうしてこうなりたいの！
subtitles.english: Why do I want to be like this!

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: 真っ暗お部屋で反省会
subtitles.english: A reflection meeting in a pitch-black room.

subtitles.original: Ah no! Why no? インだもな！
subtitles.english: Ah no! Why no? Because I'm introverted!

subtitles.original: 陰キャの歌とか あり得ない！
subtitles.english: A song about a gloomy character? Unbelievable!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: ちょっと水飲んで、水飲みますね、一回。
subtitles.english: I'll drink a bit of water, I'll drink water once.

subtitles.original: うわー！ちょっとあつい！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's a bit hot!

subtitles.original: おーい！
subtitles.english: Hey!
